text: In honor of Mother's Days, the Clinton campaign today released a new video narrated by Chelsea Clinton about the fondest memories of her mom and the influence that Hillary has had on her. The video contains some newly public photos of Hillary, Chelsea, and Mrs. Rodham as well as photos from the three of them on the campaign trail. To view the video, [Click here]: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9c7Z_A9ERvo. The script of the video follows below: Chelsea Clinton: I'd like to tell you about my mom.
title: Press Release - Clinton Campaign Releases Video Narrated by Chelsea Clinton in Honor of Mother's Day
